description:
Heinkel is one of the human chimeras guarding http://anidb.net/ch14594 [Solf J. Kimblee] in Briggs. Afterwards he and his partner http://anidb.net/ch16465 [Darius] travel with http://anidb.net/ch5885 [Edward Elric].
Heinkel is tall man with moustache, short hair and glasses. In his chimera form, he has lion like upper body and mane reaching his back.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Heinkel
